thread.title: Mahabuba Rahman

author: Mahabuba Rahman
title: Mahabuba Rahman
text: I have completed my TA course online with e-Careers which covered a vast range of topics relating the course which a TA needed most when he/she worked in a school setting with young children who are most vulnerable. The quiz part is also an important learning tool as without reading text or watching the video, no one can get 80% to complete. The videos are well presented with picture and colourful writing which is easy to catch and understand the intended topics. I will recommend this excellent online course to others.
